IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PRESENT CULTURAL AND EDUCATIONAL ACTIVITIES THROUGHOUT THE GREATER HAMPTON ROADS REGION OF VIRGINIA.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE VIRGINIA ARTS FESTIVAL IS TO BRING WORLD-CLASS PERFORMING ARTS TO OUR CITIZENS AND VISITORS, IMPACT THE LIVES OF STUDENTS THROUGH OUTSTANDING EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS, COMMISSION NEW WORKS OF NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL SIGNIFICANCE, AND MAKE A TANGIBLE DIFFERENCE IN HAMPTON ROADS THROUGH REGIONAL PARTNERSHIPS AND CULTURAL TOURISM.
IRS990.Desc: DURING THE PERIOD OF JULY 1, 2022 THROUGH JUNE 18, 2023, THE VIRGINIA ARTS FESTIVAL PRODUCED 93 EVENTS: 77 TICKETED PERFORMANCES, AND 16 FREE EVENTS. THERE WERE MORE THAN 76,143 PATRONS ATTENDING WITH VISITORS FROM 48 STATES AND WASHINGTON, D.C.. AND 8 INTERNATIONAL COUNTRIES. THERE WERE 22 SOLD OUT PERFORMANCES . THE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT HAD 127 EVENTS (COMPRISED OF MASTERCLASSES, OPEN DRESS REHERSALS, PERFORMANCES, AND 'AT-SCHOOL' EVENTS), WITH LOCAL STUDENT PARTICIPATION OF 30,140, FROM 21 CITY/DISTRICTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PART V, LINE 4, INTENDED USE OF ENDOWMENT FUNDS:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: VAF USES ENDOWMENT FUNDS TO PROMOTE VARIOUS ARTS-RELATED PROGRAMS

THE VIRGINIA ARTS FESTIVAL, INC. IS AN ORGANIZATION DESCRIBED IN SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES. EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS ARE SUBJECT TO TAX ON INCOME FROM REGULARLY CONDUCTED TRADE OF BUSINESS ACTIVITIES THAT ARE NOT SUBSTANTIALLY RELATED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S EXEMPT PURPOSE. RETURNS ARE GENERALLY SUBJECT TO EXAMINATIONS FOR THREE YEARS FROM THE DATE FILED. THIS PERIOD OF LIMITATIONS HAS EXPIRED FOR RETURNS FILED FOR TAX YEARS BEFORE 2019. MANAGEMENT CONTINUALLY EVALUATES TAX POSITIONS REFLECTED IN THE FESTIVAL'S TAX FILINGS AND DOES NOT BELIEVE THAT ANY MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS EXIST. VAF REALTY, LLC (REALTY) IS ORGANIZED AS A SINGLE-MEMBER LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY. THE VIRGINIA ARTS FESTIVAL, INC. IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF REALTY. AS SUCH, REALTY IS CONSIDERED A DISREGARDED ENTITY FOR INCOME TAX PURPOSES AND ITS NET ASSETS AND ACTIVITIES ARE INCLUDED IN THE VIRGINIA ARTS FESTIVAL, INC.'S TAX RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PART XI, LINE 4B, OTHER:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHANGE IN BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN ASSETS HELD BY THE HAMPTON ROADS COMMUNITY FOUNDATION $63,054 AND GAIN ON SALE OF FIXED ASSETS $2,000.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PART XII, LINE 4B, OTHER:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GAIN ON SALE OF FIXED ASSETS $2,000.
THE AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE FORM 990 AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE IS PROVIDED WITH A COPY PRIOR TO FILING. BOARD MEMBERS RECEIVE A COPY OF THE FULL FORM 990 IF REQUESTED.

THE BOARD PRESIDENT REVIEWS/EVALUATES THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPARATIVE COMPENSATION. AMOUNTS PAID TO OTHER EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS IN SIMILAR POSITIONS ARE OBTAINED AND USED AS A BASIS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION. OTHER KEY EMPLOYEES ARE EVALUATED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.
THE 990, GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE WEB AND UPON REQUEST.
CHANGE IN BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN ASSETS HELD BY THE HAMPTON ROADS COMMUNITY FOUNDATION: $(63,054)
